product_name: Benchmade 556 Mini-Griptilian Serrated Locking Knife - Olive
long_description: A cinch to use and super lightweight, this knife features a partially serrated, coated blade, molded handle and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism. Coated, 154 CM stainless-steel, combination-edge blade is strong and sharp enough to slice through food, wire and ropes with ease. The strong, spring-loaded AXIS locking mechanism adjusts smoothly for ease of operation. Ambidextrous blade is keenly unleashed with a simple push of the thumb-stud openers. Molded nylon handle is lightweight and easy to grip. Reversible pocket clip makes storage and carry easy--just clip it on your pocket or belt and go! Silky carrying sheath included.
short_description: A cinch to use and super lightweight, this knife features a partially serrated, coated blade, molded handle and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism.
